SELECT b.region_name as lanIdName, c.org_name as orgName, a.TOTAL_IN_NUM as totalInNum, a.TOTAL_OUT_NUM as totalOutNum, a.stock_num as stockNum, a.PURCHASE_NUM as purchaseNum, a.MANUAL_NUM as manualNum, a.TRANS_IN_NUM as transInNum, a.SELL_NUM as sellNum, a.UNCONTRACT_NUM as uncontractNum, a.CONTRACT_NUM as contractNum, a.REGISTER_NUM as registerNum, a.TRANS_OUT_NUM as transOutNum, a.RETURN_NUM as returnNum, a.WEEK_AVG_SELL_NUM as weekAvgSellNum FROM RPT_PARTNER_OPERATING_DAY a LEFT JOIN par_merchant par ON par.merchant_id = a.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_common_org c ON INSTR(par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE, c.path_code) AND c.org_level='3' LEFT JOIN sys_common_region b ON a.city_id = b.region_id WHERE 1=1
and str_to_date(a.DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{req.dateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(a.DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{req.dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and a.CITY_ID in
#{item}
and
INSTR( par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE, #{item})
group by a.CITY_ID,SUBSTRING_INDEX(par.PAR_CRM_ORG_PATH_CODE,'.',4)
